verses.verse: "When<WH3588> you go<WH3318> out to battle<WH4421> against<WH5921> your enemies<WH340> and see<WH7200> horses<WH5483> and chariots<WH7393> [and] people<WH5971> more<WH7227> numerous<WH7227> than<WH4480> you, do not be afraid<WH3372> of them; for the Lord<WH3068> your God,<WH430> who<WH834> brought<WH5927> you up from the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> is with you.
"Now it shall come<WH1961> about that when you are approaching<WH7126> the battle,<WH4421> the priest<WH3548> shall come<WH5066> near<WH5066> and speak<WH1696> to the people.<WH5971>

"And he shall say<WH559> to them, 'Hear,<WH8085> O Israel,<WH3478> you are approaching<WH7126> the battle<WH4421> against<WH5921> your enemies<WH340> today.<WH3117> Do not be fainthearted.<WH7401> <WH3824> Do not be afraid,<WH3372> or panic,<WH2648> or tremble<WH6206> before<WH4480> <WH6440> them,
for the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> is the one who goes<WH1980> with you, to fight<WH3898> for you against<WH5973> your enemies,<WH340> to save<WH3467> you.'

"The officers<WH7860> also shall speak<WH1696> to the people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559> 'Who<WH4310> is the man<WH376> that has built<WH1129> a new<WH2319> house<WH1004> and has not dedicated<WH2596> it? Let him depart<WH1980> and return<WH7725> to his house,<WH1004> lest<WH6435> he die<WH4191> in the battle<WH4421> and another<WH312> man<WH376> dedicate<WH2596> it.

Let him depart<WH1980> and return<WH7725> to his house,<WH1004> lest<WH6435> he die<WH4191> in the battle<WH4421> and another<WH312> man<WH376> begin<WH2490> to use<WH2490> its fruit.<WH2490>

'And who<WH4310> is the man<WH376> that is engaged<WH781> to a woman<WH802> and has not married<WH3947> her? Let him depart<WH1980> and return<WH7725> to his house,<WH1004> lest<WH6435> he die<WH4191> in the battle<WH4421> and another<WH312> man<WH376> marry<WH3947> her.'

"Then the officers<WH7860> shall speak<WH1696> further<WH3254> to the people,<WH5971> and they shall say,<WH559> 'Who<WH4310> is the man<WH376> that is afraid<WH3372> and fainthearted<WH7401> <WH3824>? Let him depart<WH1980> and return<WH7725> to his house,<WH1004> so that he might not make his brothers' hearts<WH3824> melt<WH4549> like his heart.<WH3824>'

"And it shall come<WH1961> about that when the officers<WH7860> have finished<WH3615> speaking<WH1696> to the people,<WH5971> they shall appoint<WH6485> commanders<WH8269> of armies<WH6635> at the head<WH7218> of the people.<WH5971>
"When<WH3588> you approach<WH7126> a city<WH5892> to fight<WH3898> against<WH5921> it, you shall offer<WH7121> it terms<WH7121> of peace.<WH7965>

"And it shall come<WH1961> about, if<WH518> it agrees<WH6030> to make<WH6030> peace<WH7965> with you and opens<WH6605> to you, then it shall be that all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> who are found<WH4672> in it shall become<WH1961> your forced<WH4522> labor<WH4522> and shall serve<WH5647> you.
"However, if<WH518> it does not make<WH7999> peace<WH7999> with you, but makes<WH6213> war<WH4421> against<WH5973> you, then you shall besiege<WH6696> it.
"When the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives<WH5414> it into your hand,<WH3027> you shall strike<WH5221> all<WH3605> the men<WH2138> in it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword.<WH2719>

"Only<WH7534> the women<WH802> and the children<WH2945> and the animals<WH929> and all<WH3605> that is in the city,<WH5892> all<WH3605> its spoil,<WH7998> you shall take<WH962> as booty<WH962> for yourself; and you shall use<WH398> the spoil<WH7998> of your enemies<WH340> which<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> has given<WH5414> you.

"Thus<WH3651> you shall do<WH6213> to all<WH3605> the cities<WH5892> that are very<WH3966> far<WH7350> from you, which<WH834> are not of the cities<WH5892> of these<WH428> nations<WH1471> nearby.<WH2008>

"Only<WH7534> in the cities<WH5892> of these<WH428> peoples<WH5971> that the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> is giving<WH5414> you as an inheritance,<WH5159> you shall not leave<WH2421> alive<WH2421> anything<WH3605> that breathes.<WH5397>

"But you shall utterly<WH2763> destroy<WH2763> them, the Hittite<WH2850> and the Amorite,<WH567> the Canaanite<WH3669> and the Perizzite,<WH6522> the Hivite<WH2340> and the Jebusite,<WH2983> as the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> has commanded<WH6680> you,

in order<WH4616> that they may not teach<WH3925> you to do<WH6213> according to all<WH3605> their detestable<WH8441> things<WH8441> which<WH834> they have done<WH6213> for their gods,<WH430> so that you would sin<WH2398> against the Lord<WH3068> your God.<WH430>

"When<WH3588> you besiege<WH6696> a city<WH5892> a long<WH7227> time,<WH3117> to make<WH3898> war<WH3898> against<WH5921> it in order to capture<WH8610> it, you shall not destroy<WH7843> its trees<WH6086> by swinging<WH5080> an axe<WH1631> against<WH5921> them; for you may eat<WH398> from them, and you shall not cut<WH3772> them down.<WH3772> For is the tree<WH6086> of the field<WH7704> a man,<WH120> that it should be besieged<WH4692> by you?

"Only<WH7534> the trees<WH6086> which<WH834> you know<WH3045> are not fruit<WH3978> trees<WH6086> you shall destroy<WH7843> and cut<WH3772> down,<WH3772> that you may construct<WH1129> siegeworks<WH4692> against<WH5921> the city<WH5892> that is making<WH6213> war<WH4421> with you until<WH5704> it falls.<WH3381>
